metadata.title: CVE-2024-45491 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in libexpat before 2.6.3. dtdCopy in xmlparse.c canhave an integer overflow for nDefaultAtts on 32-bit platforms (whereUINT_MAX equals SIZE_MAX).

criterions.comment: expat package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
xmlrpc-c package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
vnc4 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
